citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
In the veterinary drug cabinet, there were multiple bottles of expired medications intermingled with the other drugs. These
included: Methocarbamol 500mg, Chloramphenicol 1000mg, and Cephalexin 500mg (all expired 11/23), Ondansetron 8
mg exp. 9/23, and Banamine injectable which expired 10/23. Expired medications may not be effective in treating animals
and could negatively impact their health and welfare if given. The licensee is responsible for the use of appropriate
methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries, and the availability of emergency, weekend, and
holiday care.
Correct by December 12, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
In the veterinary drug cabinet, there were multiple bottles of expired medications intermingled with the other drugs. These 
included: Methocarbamol 500mg, Chloramphenicol 1000mg, and Cephalexin 500mg (all expired 11/23), Ondansetron 8 
mg exp. 9/23, and Banamine injectable which expired 10/23. Expired medications may not be effective in treating animals 
and could negatively impact their health and welfare if given. The licensee is responsible for the use of appropriate 
methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries, and the availability of emergency, weekend, and 
holiday care. 
 
Correct by December 12, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
